Articles.Content:
Sent a Probe to Eeloo for the first time. Had some trouble on the way there though. 1. Launched at the wrong time. 2. Two engines failed.

Difficult journey, but I made it!

I suggest using an imgur account, they are free, and uploading the screenshot to it then linking here. Otherwise you are trying to show us a screenshot that does not exist (I don't think anyone can view your image)
Yep. Upload the screenshot to Imgur.com and use their BBCode link in your post. (Or one of the similar services.)
